design.resource: ## Script (Python) "CAMBIAWF" ##bind container=container ##bind context=context ##bind namespace= ##bind script=script ##bind subpath=traverse_subpath ##parameters= ##title= ## for doc in context.getAllDocuments(): if doc.getItem('iol_workflow'): doc.setItem('iol_workflow','iol_sue_test_wf') doc.doAction('init') return 'ok'
